column4: Heyho! I just had a pretty weird problem. When booting up linux without a monitor attached to it (for VNC use) the screen will onlu show like 640x480 resolution ;/
Wonder if thats a common problem or just for my hardware
Someone might want to add my experience to https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FixVideoResolutionHowto so others can solve similar problems
it's a wiki, it would be great if you could
